analytic.title: Aspects of the Persecution of Christians in the Sasanian Empire during the Reign of Schapur II (309–379)

biblStruct.note: "In this paper I focus mostly on the large persecution during the reign of Shapur II (309-379) which began in 340/41 and was finished with his death in 379. The subject is a small part of a more extensive work on the history of the church of the south-Persian province Huzistan (the ancient 'Elam) up to the year 410, on which I am now at work. Out of a wide field of questions I want to pick out two problems: First, the view of the persecution in the Christian sources. Second, the motives for the persecution." (p. 73)
